description:
net: do not set SO_REUSEADDR for windows

Fixes issue 2307.

messages.text:
Sorry for the late review, but please add a comment
saying why SO_REUSEADDR isn't there (in contrast
to the other implementations).  Otherwise someone
will come along and think "hey, looks like they forgot
something" and re-add it.

Thanks.
Russ

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: mikioh.mikioh@gmail.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM
